articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines 
    Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Ralph Gonsalves, prime minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to grow strong, the message wished him and the government of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines greater success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Thai Delegation
    Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from a delegation of the Thailand-DPRK Parliament Friendship Group on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Friday by Picharn Piboonwattanawong, member of the parliament and president of the Thailand-DPRK Parliament Friendship Group, who is heading the delegation.

articles.content:
Greetings to Austrian Federal President
    Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Thomas Klestil, federal president of Austria, on Oct. 24 on the occasion of the national day of Austria.
 Expressing the belief that the relations between the DPRK and Austria would develop in the mutual interests in the future, too, the message wished him success in his work for prosperity of the country.
